latencyTestsFrecuency.description: Sets latency tests period of time (in seconds).

enableModules.description: Enables/disables the modules included in the device.

enableFileUpload.description: Enables/disables upload file feature from an IoT device to the configured IoT Hub.

numberOfMessagesToUpload.description: Sets the number of messages to send in a file upload.

storageAccount.description: Azure Storage Account of the file upload target.

storageContainer.description: Azure Storage Container of the file upload target.

connectionString.description: Azure Storage connection string of the file upload target.

telemetryFrecuency.description: Sets the elapsed time (in seconds) between two messages.

telemetryLogColor.description: Sets the color used to display telemtry logs.

errorFrecuency.description: Sets the elapsed time (in seconds) between two messages.

errorLogColor.description: Sets the color used to display error logs.

commissioningFrecuency.description: Sets the elapsed time (in seconds) between two messages.

commissioningLogColor.description: Sets the color used to display commossioning logs.

twinReportedMessagesFrecuency.description: Sets the elapsed time (in seconds) between two messages.

twinReportedLogColor.description: Sets the color used to display twin reported properties logs.

readingTwinLogColor.description: Sets the color used to display read twin properties logs.

twinPropertiesDesiredChangesNotification.description: Sets the color used to display twin changes notifications logs.
